function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of data cleaning and pre-processing may result in inaccurate modeling and analysis.","Impact":"Misleading insights and decisions based on flawed data.","Mitigation":"Implement thorough data cleaning and pre-processing techniques.","Technologies":"Data cleaning tools and libraries like Pandas and regex for text processing.","People":"Data analysts, researchers, and decision-makers.","Owner":"Data analysis and research teams."},{"Description":"Inadequate tokenization and N-gram creation can lead to misrepresentation of the text data.","Impact":"Loss of important context and inaccurate understanding of word sequences.","Mitigation":"Utilize proper tokenization and N-gram techniques to capture meaningful word sequences.","Technologies":"NLP libraries like NLTK or spaCy for tokenization, and N-gram models for sequence analysis.","People":"Data scientists, NLP experts, and text processing specialists.","Owner":"Data science and NLP teams."},{"Description":"Misinterpretation of LDA modeling results due to lack of visual representation and interpretability.","Impact":"Difficulty in understanding topic distributions and keyword contributions.","Mitigation":"Use visualization tools like PyLDAvis for interpreting LDA model results.","Technologies":"PyLDAvis for LDA visualization.","People":"Data scientists, domain experts, and researchers.","Owner":"Data science and research teams."}]}
